content: Can we create a stream for announcing presentations/seminars/events about topics related to Lean? Does it make sense? I would like to announce and invite people to the presentation on Nov 5h of @Kevin Buzzard. Link to subscription at https://ide-fgv-br.zoom.us/meeting/register/tJ0rd-qoqjkqG9Em6l3_Mo75CENtWp9PfuBX
